items.title_original: Americans may love football, but did you know its origins are in medieval England?
items.title_neutral: Americans may love football, but did you know its origins are in medieval England?
items.excerpt: "Football" is a word used to refer to different games: American football, the game played at the Super Bowl, where a foot is rarely used to direct the ball. And elsewhere in the world, football refers to what Americans call "soccer." But where does this word really come from?
